p: Here, we present the investigation of the antibiotically active extract from an entomopathogenic fungal endophyte Akanthomyces sp. ( Ascomycota, Cordycipitaceae) isolated from L. nivale subsp. alpinum affording two novel 4-hydroxy-2-pyridone alkaloids and the known epidithiodioxopiperazine emestrin ( Chart 1 ).
